desc: Order your meat, groceries, fruit and vegetables online for delivery and collection in Bulawayo. We source and supply quality products from local suppliers to ensure you and your family can get the what you need in Zimbabwe.

layout.text:
Are you a Zimbabwean in the diaspora? Let us save you time, money and stress by coordinating your family's necessities while also supporting the Bulawayo small business community.
Welcome to your one stop shop for fresh meat, groceries and vegetables delivered directly to you and your family in Bulawayo and the surrounding areas.
We pride ourselves on working with local farmers and producers wherever possible to provide you with the best produce, at the best prices while supporting the community around us. Together, we can build a better Zimbabwe!
